details.arabic_diacless: ربناۤ اٰمنا فاغفر لـنا وارحمنا وانت خير الرٰحمين‌‌ۖ‌ۚ‏
details.arabic: رَبَّنَاۤ اٰمَنَّا فَاغۡفِرۡ لَـنَا وَارۡحَمۡنَا وَاَنۡتَ خَيۡرُ الرّٰحِمِيۡنَ‌‌ۖ‌ۚ‏
details.transliteration: Rabbana amanna faghfir lana warhamna wa anta khayrur Rahimiin
details.translations: Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us and have mercy upon us, and You are the best of the merciful.
